I.i.2.A.5.a
.
Definition:  Exclusive Contact
The term
exclusive contact
refers to sending communications with the claimant directly to a representative and generally
not
communicating directly with the claimant.
Important
:  VA does
not
honor requests for exclusive contact to restrict the communication between VA and the claimant.
